sentences.english: Tianjin Art Museum is famous for its collection of ink-stones in the field.
sentences.chinese: 天津藝術博物館以珍藏硯臺著稱於博物界。

sentences.english: Yantai practical value has been strong ever since.
sentences.chinese: 硯臺的實用價值一直延續至今。

sentences.english: They have to complete their exams on computers instead of writing on paper with brushes and ink-stones.
sentences.chinese: 他們用計算機考試，而不再用毛筆和硯臺在紙上作答。

sentences.english: The inkstones are the traditional famous specialities of China.
sentences.chinese: 硯臺是我國的傳統名特產品。

sentences.english: Have you ever seen an inkstone like this before?
sentences.chinese: 你沒見過這樣的硯臺吧。

sentences.english: Work to facilitate the collection of tens of square ink stone, it is because of personal economic conditions switch.
sentences.chinese: 工作便利收藏了幾十方硯臺，因個人經濟狀況故轉。

definition: variant of 模擬|模拟[mo2 ni3]
